response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. This exceptional item is valued at $12,000 by us due to its unique features, superior materials, and the extensive research and development that went into its creation. Considering its unmatched value and capabilities, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $10,000. We believe this is an excellent opportunity for you to experience the benefits of our product while also securing a significant savings. Should you choose to accept this offer, we assure you of prompt delivery and unparalleled customer service. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 10000}
